name: Dogs Day (itch)
description:
You play as Baloo, a reclusive academic who, on the way home from the grocery store, makes a new friend who will lead him on a life-changing journey. Act as these dogs' guide, and, in turn, they will guide you towards growth and happiness.

W/A/S/D to move, E/Click to interact with nearby things.

Primarily made during the Global Game Jam 2019, gameplay scripting finished outside of jam.
